title: Hey may i know why did i get banned!
body:
Dear riot porocles,

OK look, i know ive been toxic that game but its really not that much and i was talking to my friend (who are on my friend list) and joking aournd with them! I have the feeling that ive been banned for talking french? Can someone explain. And when i say our mid is retarded I WAS THE MID JOKING AROUND ABOUT ME!

Game 1

replies.body:
While I can't speak french, there are some pretty clear vulgarities being thrown at others.  Even if you're playing with friends, there are still others who have to be subject to that.  Your friends might also not like it either.  :/  I'm not part of the player behavior team, though.  

You'll want to post this on the [PB boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) for guidance, or hit up our Player Behavior team through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for individual context.  Good luck!
